Name: Scurvy Dogs
About the game: Scurvy Dogs is an online PvP cannon battle. Take to the water and fight to become the most feared pirate on the seven seas! Objective Collect wood to heal and upgrade your ship Take down other ships to receive great rewards Protect your ship at all costs! Navigate the sea rocks to outsmart your opponent Scurvy Dogs is cross-platform open PvP, battle or team up with your friends on mobile or pc. Discord:
